text: "Doing It All for My Baby" is a 1987 song by Huey Lewis and the News and is the fifth single from their fourth studio album Fore!. It was their fifth top 10 single from their album and making them the first band to do so. It also went to number 93 in both the United Kingdom and Australia and number 30 in Canada. == References == Category:1987 songs Category:Huey Lewis and the News songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Doing It All for My Baby
